issues.message: Consider using more general type 'Xunit.Abstractions.ITestCaseMessage' instead of 'Xunit.Abstractions.ITestCaseDiscoveryMessage'.
Consider using more general type 'Akka.Actor.ICanTell' instead of 'Akka.Actor.IActorRef'.

Consider using more general type 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Akka.MultiNodeTestRunner.Shared.NodeTest>' instead of 'System.Collections.Generic.IList<Akka.MultiNodeTestRunner.Shared.NodeTest>'.
Consider using more general type 'Akka.Actor.ICanTell' instead of 'Akka.Actor.IActorRef'.
